author: James Tanner
method: Place the milk, cream, sugar and vanilla pod in a saucepan and bring to simmering point. Add the rice and simmer gently for ten minutes, or until the rice is tender. Serve in a bowl, garnished with a twisted slice of orange.
ingredients: 300ml/10fl oz whole milk,  100ml/3½fl oz double cream,  2 tbsp caster sugar,  1 vanilla pod, split lengthways,  150g/5½oz jasmine rice,  1 slice orange, to serve
